title: Adding a Cash Advance
body:
Adding a Cash Advance¶

Note

When you know you will need funds in the future, you should send a request by adding a new cash advance. Once the request has been sent, you can check the status …

  1. Click the <i class=”fa fa-bars”></i> menu icon in the ribbon

  2. Click Finance

  3. Click Expenses

  4. Click Items

  5. Click the <i class=”fa fa-plus”></i> plus icon in the upper right hand corner

  6. Click Cash Advance

  7. Choose date by which the cash advance is needed

  8. Describe the check advance

  9. Input amount needed

  10. Choose project

  11. Choose expense type

  12. Click Save
